text: "Sometimes We Cry" is a 1997 song by Northern Irish singer Van Morrison. It is the eighth single from his 26th studio album The Healing Game. The version features the backing vocals of Georgie Fame and Brian Kennedy. In 1999, it was performed as a duet with Tom Jones for his album Reload. == References == Category:1997 songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Van Morrison songs Category:Tom Jones (singer) songs
title: Sometimes We Cry
